title: Tour de France on Netflix? Actually, I’ll just be watching dots
content:
The Tour Divide kicks off in Banff, Canada on June 9 at 8 a.m. MST, and the 2,745 mile adventure is my favorite bike race to 'spectate.'

Read the full article at Tour de France on Netflix? Actually, I’ll just be watching dots on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
